CustomField.description: Determines whether or not this account supports pricing from multiple sources/entities within the same account. Examples of this would be a cart with some items priced against a contract and some priced against account pricing, or a cart where the source of the product/price is a different vendor/supplier than other items.

CustomField.label: Allow Mixed Pricing Carts
